name: Chained McKain
description:
A poor little trunk is about to be unrooted.

Thankfully, it lies in the courtyard of a prison that houses JAUWNE MCKAIN!

Environmental activist, WWE extraordinaire, he won't stop at anything to protect lil' Trunks.

Harness the power of your trusty chain to bounce around and eliminate all your enemies

A game made for GGJ2023 in 48Hrs.

Art : Mr. Costard (Julien Costard)

Dev : Nassim Lougrada & Samuel Gay

GD : Samuel Gay & Mathieu Armand & Nassim Lougrada

Music : Lucien Jely

Use Left stick and Right trigger on controller (or WASD and SpaceBar  on Keyboard) to play!
